name: Zombie Apocalypse: Shooting 3D
description:
Be a part of this war between the undead and life survival. The world is at the stage of zombie apocalypse and you can save yourself by surviving their hits and taking shots. Shooting these zombies is the only way to survive. Take as much headshots as you can to kill them in one go.

Zombies are everywhere!! Hospital, streets and wherever you go. With each passing minute they will come at you with increasing numbers, upgrade your weapons to take them down and kill them before they kill you. Take angle shots, shoot the explosives to kill more. Stay under cover and start shooting. Do not let them get near to you and attack you.

The game has following modes:
-KILLER DINNER
-DEAD HOSPITALS
-HUNTED HOMES
-SURVIVAL KILL TO SURVIVE

Download now & start playing.

*******Features*******
- High Quality graphics with awesome sound effects
- Easy to use on screen UI controls
- Options to choose weapon guns before start of the level
- Multiple playing gameplay modes
- Realistic Background environment
- On screen GPS zombie locator
